abstract: The Government of Singapore Investment Corporation has cut its stake in Citigroup to less than 5 percent, realizing a $1.6 billion profit on the sale.
snippet: The Government of Singapore Investment Corporation has cut its stake in Citigroup to less than 5 percent, realizing a $1.6 billion profit on the sale.
lead_paragraph: The Government of Singapore Investment Corporation has cut its stake in Citigroup to less than 5 percent, realizing a $1.6 billion profit on the sale.

headline.main: Singapore Profits on Sale of Citigroup Stake
